ie.gmit.sw.api.similarity.indexes

Class CachingSimilarityIndex

  • Object
    • CachingSimilarityIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityIndex

    public class CachingSimilarityIndex
extends Object
implements SimilarityIndex
    CachingSimilarityIndex is a wrapper class around a SimilarityIndex implementation that caches any computed values and will return the same values if the same documents are provided as input parameters for the computeIndex method (irrespective of order).

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      double computeIndex(List<Document> documents)

        public double computeIndex(List<Document> documents)

        Specified by:
        computeIndex in interface SimilarityIndex
        Parameters:
